statements: SELECT * FROM off_chain_data WHERE id = 1;

SELECT id, data_type FROM off_chain_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM off_chain_data ORDER BY data_type DESC;
SELECT id, blockchain_transaction_id, data_type FROM off_chain_data WHERE data_type = 'example';
SELECT id, data_type, data_value FROM off_chain_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT data_type, data_value FROM off_chain_data WHERE blockchain_transaction_id = 12345 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, blockchain_transaction_id, data_type, data_value FROM off_chain_data WHERE blockchain_transaction_id IN (54321, 67890);
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 1000 AND transaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_hash, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM off_chain_data;
SELECT id, data_hash, metadata FROM off_chain_data WHERE blockchain_transaction_id = 123;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 1000;
SELECT data_id, transaction_id FROM data_links ORDER BY link_id DESC;
SELECT timestamp, sender_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM off_chain_data WHERE blockchain_transaction_id = 100;
SELECT id, data_hash, timestamp FROM off_chain_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND receiver_address = '0x456def' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT d.data_hash, b.amount, b.timestamp FROM off_chain_data d JOIN data_links l ON d.id = l.data_id JOIN blockchain_transactions b ON l.transaction_id = b.transaction_id;
SELECT d.*, b.* FROM off_chain_data d LEFT JOIN data_links l ON d.id = l.data_id LEFT JOIN blockchain_transactions b ON l.transaction_id = b.transaction_id WHERE b.amount > 1000 ORDER BY d.id ASC;

SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT off_chain_data.data_type, data_links.blockchain_transaction_id FROM off_chain_data JOIN data_links ON off_chain_data.id = data_links.off_chain_data_id WHERE data_links.link_id = 456;

SELECT name, type FROM data_sources WHERE type = 'API' ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT metadata.description, data_links.transaction_id FROM metadata JOIN data_links ON metadata.transaction_id = data_links.transaction_id WHERE metadata.data_id = '4a47d46f-754f-41c3-956e-5d44f297f04e';
SELECT DISTINCT block_number FROM transactions WHERE block_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY block_number ASC;
